definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Exchange greetings after the two sides agree to meet again to examine the price.
sentences.chinese: 寒暄過後，雙方約好見面後再看房談價。

sentences.english: It's not good for your negotiating position if you haven't played in six months.
sentences.chinese: 如果你6個月沒打球，在談價方面對你是不利的。
